headline: NVR (NVR) Announces US$750 Million Buyback Program With No Expiration Date
summary: NVR (NVR) recently announced a share repurchase program for up to $750 million, without an expiration date, a move that underscores its strong confidence in future performance. This follows a quarterly earnings report released on July 23, 2025, which revealed decreases in net income and diluted earnings per share compared to the previous year. Despite this, the company's stock rose by 5% over the last quarter, a trend potentially bolstered by broader market optimism as the S&P 500 and Nasdaq...
